Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 based Ru catalysts

Sentencas: based Ru catalysts were studied as potential new anodic materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells directly fed with methane and operating at intermediate temperature under water deficient conditions.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 based Ru catalysts

Sentencas: Two kinds of materials very close in composition were obtained following two different preparation procedures.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 based Ru catalysts

Sentencas: Catalyst samples were characterized by physicochernical methods (XRD, SEM, BET and Chemical Analysis) and studied in methane steam reforming under water deficient conditions.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 based Ru catalysts

Sentencas: Carbon formation during catalytic testing was studied by temperature programmed oxidation (TPO).
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 based Ru catalysts

Sentencas: Both types of catalysts were found very active and resistant to carbon formation.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 based Ru catalysts

Sentencas: The unusual oscillatory behavior of the catalytic activity observed for one type of catalyst was discussed.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of methane over La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 based Ru catalysts
